featured.text: A standard of living is considered high when it includes __(31)__ necessities but also certain comforts and luxuries; it is considered low when food, clean water, housing, and __(32)__ necessities are limited or lacking.
To convince people that temporary housing can be easily found.

definition.zh_def: 住房，指用來居住的建築或空間。
definition.en_def: Housing refers to buildings or structures that are used as living spaces.
definition.example: The city is working on new housing projects to accommodate the growing population.
